results.title: Vitamin D supplementation rescues simvastatin induced myopathy in mice via improving mitochondrial cristae shape.
results.text_hl: Results indicated that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ administration (80 mg/kg) impaired skeletal @<m>DISEASE_Muscle_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019042 @@@muscle@@@ with the increased serum creatine kinase (CK) level and the declined grip strength, which were alleviated by @CHEMICAL_Vitamin_D @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014807 @@@vitamin D@@@ supplementation.

citations.NLM: Ren L, Xuan L, Han F, Zhang J, Gong L, Lv Y, Zhang W, Yang S, Xu B, Yan Y, Guo L, Liu H, Wan Z, Liu L. Vitamin D supplementation rescues simvastatin induced myopathy in mice via improving mitochondrial cristae shape. Toxicol Appl Pharmacol. 2020 Aug 15;401():115076. PMID: 32479918

results.title: [Adverse muscle effects of a podofyllotoxin-containing cytotoxic drug product with simvastatin].
results.text_hl: [Adverse @<m>DISEASE_Muscle_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019042 @@@muscle effects@@@ of a podofyllotoxin-containing cytotoxic drug product with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@].

results.title: Statins inhibit neutrophil infiltration in skeletal muscle reperfusion injury.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: The inhibition by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ of @DISEASE_Reperfusion_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D015427 @@@IRI@@@-induced neutrophil infiltration in skeletal @<m>DISEASE_Muscle_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019042 @@@muscle@@@ suggests that statins may be a useful therapy to attenuate the severity of @DISEASE_Reperfusion_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D015427 @@@IRI@@@ but their precise mechanisms of action remains to be determined.

citations.NLM: Cowled PA, Khanna A, Laws PE, Field JB, Varelias A, Fitridge RA. Statins inhibit neutrophil infiltration in skeletal muscle reperfusion injury. J Surg Res. 2007 Aug;141(2):267-76. PMID: 17559881
citations.BibTeX: @article{17559881, title={Statins inhibit neutrophil infiltration in skeletal muscle reperfusion injury.}, author={Cowled PA and Khanna A and Laws PE and Field JB and Varelias A and Fitridge RA}, journal={J Surg Res}, volume={141}, number={2}, pages={267-76}}

results.title: A new therapeutic effect of simvastatin revealed by functional improvement in muscular dystrophy.
results.journal: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A
results.text_hl: Here we show positive effects of statins in @DISEASE_Muscular_Dystrophy_Duchenne @DISEASE_MESH:D020388 @@@dystrophic@@@ skeletal @<m>DISEASE_Muscle_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019042 @@@muscle@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ dramatically reduced damage and enhanced @<m>DISEASE_Muscle_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019042 @@@muscle@@@ function in @DISEASE_Muscular_Dystrophy_Duchenne @DISEASE_MESH:D020388 @@@dystrophic@@@ (mdx) @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

citations.NLM: Whitehead NP, Kim MJ, Bible KL, Adams ME, Froehner SC. A new therapeutic effect of simvastatin revealed by functional improvement in muscular dystrophy. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2015 Oct 13;112(41):12864-9. PMID: 26417069

results.title: Alleviation of Simvastatin-Induced Myopathy in Rats by the Standardized Extract of Ginkgo Biloba (EGb761): Insights into the Mechanisms of Action.
results.text_hl: Here, we studied whether standardized leaf extracts of @SPECIES_3311 @@@ginkgo biloba@@@ (EGb761) would improve @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@)-induced @<m>DISEASE_Muscle_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019042 @@@muscle@@@ changes.

results.title: The Impact of US FDA and Health Canada Warnings Related to the Safety of High-dose Simvastatin
results.text_hl: Between 2010 and 2012, the US Food and Drug Administration and Health Canada issued warnings to healthcare professionals emphasizing the increased risk of @<m>DISEASE_Muscle_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019042 @@@muscle problems@@@ with high-dose @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Anand K, Sketris I, Zhang Y, Levy A, Gamble JM. The Impact of US FDA and Health Canada Warnings Related to the Safety of High-dose Simvastatin Drugs Real World Outcomes. 2017 Dec;4(4):215-223. PMID: 28956294

results.title: Structural and functional characterization of simvastatin-induced myotoxicity in different skeletal muscles.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: With @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ administration (30 days, 50mg/kg), a @DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D003866 @@@depression@@@ in the force-frequency curves in all muscles was observed, indicating the impairment @<m>DISEASE_Muscle_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019042 @@@of muscle contractility@@@; however, the EDL and DIA muscles were affected more severely than the SOL muscle.

citations.NLM: Simsek Ozek N, Bal IB, Sara Y, Onur R, Severcan F. Structural and functional characterization of simvastatin-induced myotoxicity in different skeletal muscles. Biochim Biophys Acta. 2014 Jan;1840(1):406-15. PMID: 24045089

results.title: Suspected statin-induced respiratory muscle myopathy during long-term inspiratory muscle training in a patient with diaphragmatic paralysis.
results.text_hl: OUTCOMES: The improvements in @<m>DISEASE_Muscle_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019042 @@@IMP@@@, symptoms, and functional status obtained from almost 6 months of high-intensity IMT were lost after the commencement of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Chatham K, Gelder CM, Lines TA, Cahalin LP. Suspected statin-induced respiratory muscle myopathy during long-term inspiratory muscle training in a patient with diaphragmatic paralysis. Phys Ther. 2009 Mar;89(3):257-66. PMID: 19147707
